text_logic_form: The perimeter of the regular hexagon $ABCDEF$ is $72$ units.
Find the area of the regular hexagon $ABCDEF$.
dissolved_text_logic_form: The perimeter of the regular hexagon $ABCDEF$ is $72$ units.
Find the area of the regular hexagon $ABCDEF$.
diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $GH$ is $a$ units.
The length of the line $AF$ is $12$ units.
The length of the line $DG$ is $12$ units.
The length of the line $AD$ is $12$ units.
The length of the line $DH$ is $6$ units.
The measure of angle $GDH$ is $60$ degrees.
Point $H$ lies on the line connecting $A$ and $D$.
The line $GH$ is perpendicular to the line $DH$.
line_instances: There are lines $AD$, $AE$, $AF$, $AG$, $AH$, $DB$, $DC$, $DG$, $DH$, $EB$, $EC$, $FC$, and $GH$ forming the regular hexagon $ABCDEF$.
